Ref. :

Date: {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.creation).strftime('%d-%m-%Y') or ' ' }}

Dear {{ doc.custom_salutation_ }} {{ doc.applicant_name or ' ' }},

Congratulations!!


Sub: Letter of Intent for Appointment (LOI)

  1. This is in reference to your application and subsequent telephonic interview and discussions you had with us on {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.offer_date).strftime('%d %B %Y') or ' ' }}.
  2. We are pleased to offer you the position of “{{ doc.designation or ' ' }}” on the terms and conditions discussed during the above meeting.
  3. Your appointment to the above position is subject to your being found medically fit by the certified medical officer.
  4. You are requested to join us on or before {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.custom_joining_date).strftime('%d %B %Y') or ' ' }}. Your Probation Period will be 6 Months.
  5. Detailed appointment let ter envisaging all terms and conditions shall be issued to you at the time of joining.
  6. Please bring along with the originals (which will be returned to you after verification) & photocopy of all certificates and testimonials supporting your qualification and experience, reliving letter from your previous employer and five (5) recent colored passport size photographs at the time of joining.
  7. This LOI is valid till the agreed date of joining or mutually agreed extension. In case you failed to join with in the stipulated time the LOI automatically will stand canceled without any further reference to you.

We look forward to have you in our organization.

Please sign the duplicate copy of this LOI as a token of having accepted our offer.

Thanking you.
